docs.snippet: A Philippine court on Tuesday convicted a U.S. Marine of killing a Filipino last year after he discovered she was a transgender woman in a hotel while he was on a break after participating in joint military exercises in the country....

headline.main: US Marine Found Guilty of Killing Transgender Filipino

docs.snippet: Standing in the pulpit where the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. led the historic Montgomery bus boycott, Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton reached out to black voters Tuesday saying the U.S. is still plagued by injustices such as mass...
docs.lead_paragraph: Standing in the pulpit where the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. led the historic Montgomery bus boycott, Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton reached out to black voters Tuesday saying the U.S. is still plagued by injustices such as mass incarceration and attempts to roll back voting rights— and she urged Americans to rebuild their bonds with one another.

headline.main: Clinton Commemorates Boycott, Says US Must Address Injustice
headline.print_headline: Clinton Commemorates Boycott, Says US Must Address Injustice
